author: Timothy Eshing
description: Perhaps substitute Â¼ shot demerara sugar syrup for the sugar cube and all that muddling. Whether runny or dry sugar, this flip-style cocktail is balanced and complex.
name: Le Coq d'Or (The Golden Rooster)

recipeInstructions.text: Saturate sugar cube with Peychaud's in base of shaker and MUDDLE thoroughly
Add cognac and stir to ensure sugar is dissolved
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
